title: PMDG 777 Crack + Original DLL Files
description:
As requested the original and cracked dll files for PMDG 777. This method below fixes the spinning display bug. Credit goes to ThumperJoe for this fix.

1) Copy cracked dll to FSX/Gauges folder.

2) Start FSX and select 777, don't do anything else.

3) With the plane selected in FSX, MOVE the cracked dll out of the FSX/Gauges folder, to your desktop for example.

4) Now copy the original dll file from this torrent to the FSX/Gauges folder.

5) FLY NOW!

This has to be repeated every time you load the plane.
